text.text:
Welcome to the TravelgateX Community, it's great to have you with us! 
 Please consider our following community guidelines. Use highlights wisely and keep conversations organized into threads.

• *Slack <#CAJ2YM0LA|platform>*: Open space to discuss our platform and products, planned and unplanned outages affecting the platform. Please do not use this channel for raising issues or reporting bugs. We have a Jira Service Desk for that
 • The Global marketplace for the travel trade: https://www.travelgatex.com
 • The best place for broader discussions or questions about code: https://docs.travelgatex.com 
 • Want to know how to join our platform? Reach out to our Sales Team at info@xmltravelgate.com 
 • *Careers*. See something that interests you? Apply here https://xtg.bamboohr.com/jobs
 • Blog TravelgateX https://blog.travelgatex.com

>Useful for slack users: 
>• *<#CLFB16G5R|alerts>*: TravelgateX product alerts notifications 
>• *<#CM9DVAPRC|alerts-suppliers>*: 3rd party Suppliers alerts notifications
>• *<#CH3855V6U|announcements>*: TGX Products releases and updates
>• *<#CMXC6JNG7|announcements-external>*: External Products releases and updates
>• *<#CLLD9S9SA|deployments>*: Platform deployments
>• *`alertsx`*: Command for amazing *Alerts-X* queries

Let us know if you have any questions! 
 Thanks for making our community as awesome as it is.
